DOC.brief_summary: This survey conduct prepare application material re-examination Pharmaceutical Affairs Laws Enforcement Regulation , aim reconfirm clinical usefulness STOCRIN collect safety efficacy information accord Re-examination Regulation New Drugs . Post-marketing survey consider applicable clinical trial thus result survey post conclusion . The result submit public health official require applicable national international law .
DOC.criteria: HIV1 Infected Patient Patient Who Is Treated With Stocrin 600 Mg Tablet Within Local Label During The Enrollment Period ( A Patient Who Changes The Therapy From Stocrin 200 Mg Capsule To Stocrin 600 Mg Tablet Can Be Eligible . ) Patient Who Has A Contraindication To Stocrin According To The Local Label
